summary: Diff updates the ContactLocationSection address fallback text and modifies the Footer (notably removing the Instagram social link per file summary). The default content data file is modified but truncated, so phone/address defaults and admin editor fallback cannot be fully verified from provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Public site Contact card shows a line reading exactly: "Phone: +91 94508 14050" and phone remains its own dedicated phone line.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided ContactLocationSection diff is truncated and does not include the phone rendering portion, so the exact displayed phone line text and formatting cannot be confirmed from the evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin Editor "Contact Info" tab loads with the updated address/phone as the default/fallback when no saved content exists.
missing_requirements.reason: The default content file where fallback contact info likely lives is truncated at the contactInfo object, so the updated default phone/address values and their use by the editor cannot be verified from the provided diff.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions updated defaults but not verifiable from code shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Instagram is no longer shown as an available social platform anywhere on the public site (no icons/links rendered anywhere).
missing_requirements.reason: Footer changes indicate Instagram removal there, but the diff evidence does not show a project-wide removal (only Footer is shown). Without seeing other components that may render social links, the "nowhere on the public site" condition cannot be confirmed.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (Footer summary mentions Instagram removed, but no evidence for other locations)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified admin access behavior in the Footer (Admin quick link and admin login dialog integration).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists Instagram removal and contact/address updates as goals, and lists admin/auth/editor access control changes as non-goals; the Footer diff includes admin login dialog wiring and admin button behavior changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (Footer/App/NavBar/AdminLoginDialog summaries referencing admin auth/editor behavior)
